pack.name: Submission Sprint
pack.tagline: Pharma leaders about to file — and drowning in documents
pack.description: 75-100 regulatory leaders at companies with imminent FDA submission deadlines, enriched with specific filing details and timeline pressure.
pack.targetBuyer: Regulatory document AI companies (Raycaster, Artos, Scoop)
